name: The Quacken
description:
A small duck getting separated from his parents by the leading monarchs of the country: The crocodiles.
It's about to get de-feathered and eaten by the mad crocodiles. What can this young little duckling do to escape the fangs of those reptiles and their obedient followers?  

Controls:
Up = W
Down = S
Left = A
Right = D

This prototype is supposed to show some features of the game. Some of them are more polished, some are less polished. After you played it we would love to receive some feedback and comments from you: https://forms.gle/7TVaLZDFV77a7LJh7
